mapper.sql: ID, IS_SUBMIT, IS_DO, IS_DELETE, CREATED_AT, GENDER, UPDATED_AT, MOBILE, BIRTHDAY, ID_NUMBER, ID_TYPE, EXPERTS_FROM, POLITICS_STATUS, NATION, GRADUATE_SCHOOL, HIGHT_EDUCATION, MAJOR, WORK_UNIT, TELEPHONE, FAX, MAKE_TECH_DATE, HEALTH_STATE, ADDRESS, PROFESS_TECH_TITLES, TIME_TO_WORK, TIME_START_WORK, UNIT_ADDRESS, POST_CODE, DEGREE, AT_DUTY, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID, PURCHASE_DEP_ID, STATUS, IS_BLACK, HONESTY_SCORE, REL_NAME
mapper.select:
select
from T_SES_EMS_EXPERT where 1=1 and IS_SUBMIT ！= '0' and IS_DELETE != 1
AND REL_NAME like '%${relName}%'
AND EXPERTS_FROM = '${expertsFrom}'
AND STATUS = ${status}
AND EXPERTS_TYPE_ID = ${expertsTypeId}
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_EMS_EXPERT (ID, IS_SUBMIT, IS_DO, IS_DELETE, CREATED_AT, GENDER, UPDATED_AT, MOBILE, BIRTHDAY, ID_NUMBER, ID_TYPE, EXPERTS_FROM, POLITICS_STATUS, NATION, GRADUATE_SCHOOL, HIGHT_EDUCATION, MAJOR, WORK_UNIT, TELEPHONE, FAX, MAKE_TECH_DATE, HEALTH_STATE, ADDRESS, PROFESS_TECH_TITLES, TIME_TO_WORK, TIME_START_WORK, UNIT_ADDRESS, POST_CODE, DEGREE, AT_DUTY, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID, PURCHASE_DEP_ID, STATUS, IS_BLACK, HONESTY_SCORE, REL_NAME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSubmit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertsFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{politicsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NATION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hightEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeTechDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{healthState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{professTechTitles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeToWork,jdbcType=DATE}, #{timeStartWork,jdbcType=DATE}, #{unitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{atDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseDepId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isBlack,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{honestyScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{relName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update T_SES_EMS_EXPERT
IS_SUBMIT = #{isSubmit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DO = #{isDo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_TYPE = #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MAKE_TECH_DATE = #{makeTechDate,jdbcType=DATE},
HEALTH_STATE = #{healthState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFESS_TECH_TITLES = #{professTechTitles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

REL_NAME = #{relName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_EMS_EXPERT set IS_SUBMIT = #{isSubmit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DO = #{isDo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_TYPE = #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERTS_FROM = #{expertsFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POLITICS_STATUS = #{politicsStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NATION = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADUATE_SCHOOL = #{graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIGHT_EDUCATION = #{hightEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAJOR = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_UNIT = #{workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAKE_TECH_DATE = #{makeTechDate,jdbcType=DATE}, HEALTH_STATE = #{healthState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROFESS_TECH_TITLES = #{professTechTitles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME_TO_WORK = #{timeToWork,jdbcType=DATE}, TIME_START_WORK = #{timeStartWork,jdbcType=DATE}, UNIT_ADDRESS = #{unitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEGREE = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AT_DUTY = #{atDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID = #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURCHASE_DEP_ID = #{purchaseDepId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_BLACK = #{isBlack,jdbcType=CHAR}, HONESTY_SCORE = #{honestyScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REL_NAME = #{relName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
